name: Compliance Check
description: GPP determines whether the payment is compliant as per regulations. GPP can interface with external compliance engines to perform the compliance check.

flowitems.name: Compliance Validation
flowitems.description: Stopped payments will be routed to Wait OFAC. Available action is Force

flowitems.name: Wait OFAC
flowitems.description: For batch interface, sub batch message and for individual interface message will wait in Wait OFAC status

flowitems.name: Compliance Interface
flowitems.description: Compliance interface between GPP and the Financial Institution’s Compliance system

flowitems.name: 1st response No Hit
flowitems.description: Compliance interface between GPP and the Financial Institution’s Compliance system

flowitems.name: 1st Response Possible Hit
flowitems.description: Compliance interface between GPP and the Financial Institution’s Compliance system

flowitems.name: Compliance Interface
flowitems.description: Compliance interface between GPP and the Financial Institution’s Compliance system

flowitems.name: 2nd Response No Hit
flowitems.description: Compliance interface between GPP and the Financial Institution’s Compliance system

flowitems.name: 2nd Response Hit
flowitems.description: Compliance interface between GPP and the Financial Institution’s Compliance system
